    • Method Detail

      • data

        public static DataFormat data()
        Creates a binary body format.
        Returns:
        a new binary body format

      • get

        public Result<byte[],Failure> get(Message<?> message)
        Description copied from class: Format
        Retrieves a body representation from a message.

        Processing failure should be reported using the following HTTP status codes:

        • Response.UnsupportedMediaType for missing bodies;
        • Response.BadRequest for malformed bodies, unless a more specific status code is available.

        The default implementation returns a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, unless explicitly overridden.

        Overrides:
        get in class Format<byte[]>
        Parameters:
        message - the message whose body representation managed by this body format is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the binary representation of message, as retrieved from the input stream supplied by its InputFormat body, if one is available; a failure describing the processing error, otherwise

      • set

        public <M extends Message<M>> M set(M message,
                                    byte... value)
        Configures a message to hold a binary body representation.
        • the InputFormat body of message is configured to generate an input stream reading the binary value;
        • the OutputFormat body of message is configured to write the binary value to the output stream supplied by the accepted output stream supplier.
        Overrides:
        set in class Format<byte[]>
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a body representation managed by this body format
        value - the body representation being configured for message by this body format
        Returns:
        the configured message
